item.title: New Site
item.description: New Site Welcome to the new SourceBans++ site, this site is meant to serve as a replacement to the old one, featuring a brand new documentation, and FAQ pages

item.title: Quickstart
item.description: Prerequisites Before we get started, let’s make sure you meet these following requirements: Web A working MySQL/MariaDB database PHP Version >= 5.3 Game Sourcemod Metamod Uploading Download the latest release from the release page Upload everything that’s within web folder to either the root of your web server or a folder that you wish to allocate Upload everything that’s within game to the game mod directory (tf, cs, dod, etc) Write Permission config.

item.title: Inquiries
item.description: Web Which ports does the SourceBans Web-Panel require to be open? If your web panel shows Error Connecting for your game server when it is actually online, ask your web host to open UDP incoming from your game server port (usually 27015). If either the RCON console, Admin Rehashing or Kick-It does not work on your web panel, ask your web host to open TCP outgoing to your game server port (usually 27015).

item.title: Updating
item.description: Downloading Download the latest zip-archive from the release page Web Panel Backup your database in case of corruption Upload and overwrite all contents in web to your SourceBans++ installation Delete install directory Navigate to your SourceBans++ website and append updater after it (Ex: example.com/updater, example.com/sb/updater) After it displays Installation up-to-date., delete updater directory and you are done Plugin Upload and overwrite all contents in game to your root game directory (Ex: tf, cs, etc) Reconfigure the config files in addons/sourcemod/configs/sourcebans/ Ensure everything is running smooth, and you are done Plugin (Upgrading from version <= 1.

item.title: Adding Server
item.description: Adding server to web panel Navigate to Admin Panel -> Server Settings -> Add new server Fill out the information about the server with correct RCON Password and click Add Server when done On refresh, record down the ID column for the corresponding server Configuring SourceBans++’s ServerID Navigate to addons/sourcemod/configs/sourcebans Edit sourcebans.cfg and modify ServerID to the ID value you recorded down Save, reupload file, and reload map/restart server
